title: Nintendo Announces New Hardware, Confuses Everyone - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.09.24
description:
Pre-order New World: Aeternum now on PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S to get the Azoth Stalker Wolf Mount and prepare for launch on October 15! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Nintendo’s alarming hardware announcement, Tim’s preview of a cool upcoming game, and Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero is breaking limits on Steam.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - is our Game of The Year 2024 so far
 - There’s no stream today after!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway
 - And you can get Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:39 - Housekeeping
             -  The Roper Report   -
00:05:39 - Nintendo has revealed new hardware: Alarmo
00:18:46 - Tim’s preview of ARI BUKTU
00:26:46 - Dragon Ball Sparking Zero is already going Super Saiyan on the Steam charts
00:33:10 - ‘Shinobi’ is getting a movie adaptation
00:42:40 - Microsoft has announced an Indiana Jones themed Xbox Series X & Controller
00:46:42 - Wee News!
00:48:43 - SuperChats
00:54:04 - You‘re Wrong
